group_1.narration: No matter how I try...@I just can't talk about myself...@I'm miserable, and pathetic...@I hate this so much...
And now I'm sobbing, which is even@more pathetic.
Me breaking down like that@out of nowhere obviously rattled her.

group_1.textLeft: Um! Ren?!@Ren...?
Ahhh...@Oh no, I'm sorry!
I... I didn't mean to try to force you...
Ah!@Please don't misunderstand, okay?
Just because I told you about@myself, that doesn't mean...
I-I'm not trying to say that you@have to tell me! Okay?
...B-but still, I'm sorry...@That was wrong of me...
I wasn't trying to force it out of you...@I shouldn't have asked...
But anyway, yeah![chara:303101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303101:cheek_0][chara:303101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:303101:lipSynch_1] That's it!
I just want you to feel better, that's all...
That's the most important thing!
I bet you've been through some really@hard stuff...
I probably can't even imagine how bad@you've had it.
But...@[chara:303101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303101:motion_100][chara:303101:cheek_0][chara:303101:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303101:lipSynch_1]...Right, that's it! That!
You got all those presents today@from everybody.
They all gave them to you so you'd@feel better, Ren.
Everyone was thinking about you@when they gave them to you, right?
Isn't that...@Isn't that enough reason to live?
I mean, I know there's lots@of horrible things in the world.
But there are also shining,@beautiful things too...
As long as you have just one...
I think you can keep going no matter@what bad stuff comes your way.
I mean, think about it... The only thing@worse than all that bad stuff...
The worst thing of all would be...
If you didn't have a single shining,@beautiful thing in your life.

group_1.narration: The presents on my knees caught my@falling tears, and the light of the setting@sun was reflected in my teardrops.
So literally...@...No, not literally I guess, but the@presents became that for me... They@became my shining, beautiful things.
